Sections.Name: Options
Sections.Description: Configuration for Travel Options to suit each player.

Keys.Name: CautiousTravel
Keys.Description: Makes the speed option "Cautiously" initiate real time accelerated travel instead of fast travel

Keys.Name: StopAtInnsTravel
Keys.Description: Makes the stop for night option "Inns" initiate real time accelerated travel instead of fast travel

Keys.Name: DisableWeather
Keys.Description: Switches off weather changes during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: DisableSounds
Keys.Description: Switches off annoying sounds during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: DisableRealGrass
Keys.Description: Switches off the Real Grass mod during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: LocationPause
Keys.Description: Auto pause when encountering a game location during real time accelerated travel

Sections.Name: ShipTravel
Sections.Description: Configuration for Ship Travel restrictions to suit each player.

Keys.Name: OnlyFromPorts
Keys.Description: Restricts ship travel to be possible only from places with ports

Keys.Name: OnlyToPorts
Keys.Description: Restricts ship travel to be possible only if destination has a port, if from ports setting is enabled

Keys.Name: DefaultStartingAcceleration
Keys.Description: The initial time acceleration used after starting the game

Keys.Name: AlwaysUseStartingAcceleration
Keys.Description: Always uses the default starting acceleration when initiating a journey, rather than value from the previous journey

Keys.Name: AccelerationLimiter
Keys.Description: The maximum limit allowed for time acceleration

Sections.Name: RandomEncounterAvoidance
Sections.Description: Enable ability to avoid a random encounter based either Running or Stealth skill, whichever is higher.

Keys.Name: AvoidRandomEncounters
Keys.Description: Enable or disable random encounter avoidance.

Keys.Name: MaxChanceToAvoidEncounter
Keys.Description: Maximum percent chance to avoid an encounter with 100 stealth or running, scales with skill.
